definitions.definition: A plug of cotton or other absorbent material inserted into a body cavity or wound to absorb fluid, especially one inserted in the vagina during menstruation .
A double-headed drumstick primarily for the bass drum .
An inking pad used in lithographic printing .

main_definition: A plug of cotton or other absorbent material inserted into a body cavity or wound to absorb fluid, especially one inserted in the vagina during menstruation .
secondary_definitions: A double-headed drumstick primarily for the bass drum .
An inking pad used in lithographic printing .
